ch0328_00_shuumei/0101_0701_01_10:
Why, if it is not [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I am glad thou could make it!
ch0328_00_shuumei/0101_0701_02_10:
This bright and merry Pasio life is only possible
thanks to thee! Now then, let us join in revelry!
ch0328_00_shuumei/7101_0701_01_10: Team Star is a light I discovered at the academy.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7101_0701_02_10:
Were it not for Team Star, I would not be who I
am today.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7101_0701_03_10:
And I never would have had a bright and merry
student life with my compadres, either!
ch0328_00_shuumei/7102_0701_01_10:
Outside of Team Star, there existed another
academy compadre I could confide in.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7102_0701_02_10:
A compadre who understood me and who was a
fellow connoisseur of the fine arts.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7102_0701_03_10: They are a treasure of mine.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7103_0701_01_10:
Mathematics was the scourge of my existence—in
particular, arithmetic! ’Twas an unsolvable
mystery.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7103_0701_02_10:
I have improved my skills somewhat after
receiving tutelage from my sensei, but a long road
lies ahead of me yet.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7103_0701_03_10:
But for me to correctly understand my garments
budget, my battle against this knave called
mathematics must continue.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7104_0701_01_10:
For someone such as myself, creating any sort of
garment is a walk in the park.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7104_0701_02_10:
If there is any garment thou might desire, I am at
thy service.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7104_0701_03_10:
I will require some time, however, as I will be
creating it entirely from scratch.
ch0328_00_shuumei/7105_0701_01_10:
By the by, dost thou have an interest in ninja,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0328_00_shuumei/7105_0701_02_10:
It would set my heart at ease having a compadre
who shares my interests, even on Pasio...
ch0328_00_shuumei/7105_0701_03_10:
I brought extra ninja garments, so do tell if thou
art interested!
ch0328_00_shuumei/1701_0701_01_10: What fortuitous timing! Here is a gift for thee.
ch0328_00_shuumei/1701_0702_01_10: I am certain it will assist with thy training.
ch0328_00_shuumei/2501_0701_01_10:
If I were to craft garments befitting thee, I wonder
what theme would suit.
ch0328_00_shuumei/2501_0701_02_10:
Thy heart is bright, and thou possess an affability
that makes it easy for one to open up to thee.
ch0328_00_shuumei/2501_0701_03_10:
How doth a Dark Lord of Communication Skills
look sound to thee?
ch0328_00_shuumei/2501_0702_01_10:
Garments are meant to accentuate their wearer’s
individuality.
ch0328_00_shuumei/2501_0702_02_10:
So when you clothe thyself in my handmade
apparel...
ch0328_00_shuumei/2501_0702_03_10:
thy communication skills may reach boundless
heights!
ch0328_00_shuumei/2511_0701_01_10:
My dream is to one day become a garment
designer.
ch0328_00_shuumei/2511_0701_02_10:
In hopes of getting one step closer to that dream,
I have been creating my own original apparel.
ch0328_00_shuumei/2511_0701_03_10: And I have even peddled them at auctions!
ch0328_00_shuumei/2511_0702_01_10:
I would like to sell my own apparel at an auction
again, if I were permitted to do so on Pasio.
ch0328_00_shuumei/2511_0702_02_10:
Not only would that help me hone my skill
as a garment designer...
ch0328_00_shuumei/2511_0702_03_10:
it would also be opportune for funding my artistic
pursuits!
ch0328_00_shuumei/3001_0701_01_10:
Oft do first buyers snatch the rare goods!
Hence, rising early is an essential skill!
ch0328_00_shuumei/3003_0701_01_10:
I fear mine efforts to procure the finest fabrics
have mightily reduced my funds...
ch0328_00_shuumei/3005_0701_01_10:
Rigorous training day and night hones body and
mind alike...or so it is written in my textbook.
